content:
# It seems that I am still too far away from the target position of the stone furnace.
# I need to directly move to the coordinates of the stone patch before attempting to place the furnace.

# The coordinates of the nearest stone patch are (-14.5, -14.5).
# I will move directly to these coordinates now.

desired_stone_position = Position(-14.5, -14.5)  # Desired position at the stone patch.
move_to(desired_stone_position)  # Move to the exact position of the stone patch.
